message.entry: The size of the state does not fit the motion model.
The size of the state does not fit the motion model.\nExpected state to be a vector of P elements, or a matrix with P rows, where P can have one of the following values - {0}
The size of the state does not fit the motion model.\nExpected state to be a vector of P elements, where P can have one of the following values - {0}.
Expected the number of position dimension to be 1, 2, or 3.
In the call to {0}, Detection must have a Measurement and a MeasurementNoise.
In the call to {0}, Detection must be an objectDetection or a struct.
In the call to {0}, Detection must be a scalar.
A Detection in spherical frame must contain at least azimuth and range information to initialize a filter.
When using multiple measurement parameters structures, all parameters except the first one must define the Frame as Rectangular.
The function ''{0}'' expects the second argument to be a frame or measurement parameters specified as a struct.\nThe function should not be used with filters that set {1} to false.
Expected {0} to be a scalar or a {1}-by-{2} matrix.
